meanings.definition: The lower side or bottom of an object.
meanings.sent1: She placed the book on the underside of the table.
meanings.sent2: The cat hid under the bed, on its underside.
meanings.sent3: The spider decided to build its web on the underside of the chair.
meanings.sent4: The treasure was hidden on the underside of the old tree.
meanings.sent5: The underside of the leaf was a vibrant green color.

meanings.sent1: The mechanic inspected the underside of the car for any damage.
meanings.sent2: The road was rough, causing scratches on the car's underside.
meanings.sent3: The ants found a cozy spot to build their nest on the car's underside.
meanings.sent4: The underside of the car gleamed after a thorough wash.
meanings.sent5: The underside of the car revealed the intricate network of pipes and wires.
